entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is trying to concentrate and figure out what he's best at.

entities.name: quidditch
entities.description: A sport played on broomsticks that Harry is good at, according to Moody.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: An adult who is giving advice to Harry and has a magical eye.

relationships.description: Harry is good at Quidditch, according to Moody's statement: 'You're a damn good flier from what I've heard.'
Moody is giving advice to Harry, as seen in the conversation where Moody interrupts Harry and says 'My second piece of general advice...'
